message: Thanks for the early feedback on ConnectMe. We'll have a release with a smoother onboarding process up later this week.
Nervous about any entity that has an "onboarding process." #jargonwatch
Heh, fair enough.  Put it this way - you won't have to stare at a blank screen for 30 seconds when you first access the app.  Is that better?

Absolutely. Funny you should say 30 seconds...worked on a project years ago where some German developers had an app that required at LEAST 30 seconds between the login and being able to work...and this was in a highly caffeinated TV newsroom. They said "we shall simply explain why it has to be this way." The boss said "I shall simply explain why you will work until it is 2 seconds or less."
